    • Uses of Meeting in main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.meeting.event

      Methods in main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.meeting.event with parameters of type Meeting 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void UserLeftEvent.executeEvent(Meeting meeting)
      Sends a LEFT message to all clients except the client who sent the message Then removes the client from the meeting and closes the connection
      void UserJoinedEvent.executeEvent(Meeting meeting)
      Sends the client information to every participant of the meeting except the client who created the event
      void TransmitAudioEvent.executeEvent(Meeting meeting)
      Sends the AUDI message received by the server to all clients in the meeting which calls this event except the client who created the event This stops the presenter from hearing themselves
      void HeartbeatEvent.executeEvent(Meeting meeting)
      Refreshes the heartbeat on the meeting client who created the event
      void GetAllParticipantsEvent.executeEvent(Meeting meeting)
      Sends the user information of all the current participants of the meeting to the user who sent the message that generated this event
      abstract void Event.executeEvent(Meeting meeting)
      Perform the event described by class extending this class
      void EndOfAudioSegmentEvent.executeEvent(Meeting meeting)
      When triggered will send the original EAUD message to every client other than the presenter
      void ChangeSlideEvent.executeEvent(Meeting meeting)
      Sends the CHNG message that was received by the server to all clients in the meeting that calls this event
